question: Dolly has two books. Pandora has one. If both Dolly and Pandora read each others' books as well as their own, how many books will they collectively read by the end?
native_question: Dalibai dake dakin taro na wata makaranta sun kai 1000. Dakin taron yana da ƙofofin shiga 3, A, B, da C wanda kuma suka kasance a matsayin mafita. Idan bayan taro kashi 30% na daliban sun fita daga ginin ta hanyar mafitar A, 3/5 na ragowar sun fita ta mafitar B, sauran kuma sun fita ta hanyar C, a lissafa adadin daliban da suka fita ta hanyar C. .

branch_understandings.understanding:
1. Dalibai dake dakin taro na wata makaranta sun kai 1000. means There are 1000 students in the conference room of the school.
2. Dakin taron yana da ƙofofin shiga 3, A, B, da C wanda kuma suka kasance a matsayin mafita. means The conference room has three entrances, A, B, and C, which are used as exits.
3. Idan bayan taro kashi 30% na daliban sun fita daga ginin ta hanyar mafitar A, means If after the conference, 30% of the students left the building through exit A.
4. 3/5 na ragowar sun fita ta mafitar B, means 3/5 of the remaining students left through exit B.
5. Sauran kuma sun fita ta hanyar C, means The rest left through exit C.
6. A lissafa adadin daliban da suka fita ta hanyar C. means To find the number of students who left through exit C.

Now, I am ready for the question.

1. Dalibai dake dakin taro na wata makaranta sun kai 1000. means There are 1000 students in the conference room of the school.
2. Dakin taron yana da ƙofofin shiga 3, A, B, da C wanda kuma suka kasance a matsayin mafita. means The conference room has three entrances, A, B, and C, which are used as exits.
3. Idan bayan taro kashi 30% na daliban sun fita daga ginin ta hanyar mafitar A, means If after the meeting, 30% of the students left the building through exit A.
4. 3/5 na ragowar sun fita ta mafitar B, means 3/5 of the remaining students left through exit B.
5. Sauran kuma sun fita ta hanyar C, means The rest left through exit C.
6. A lissafa adadin daliban da suka fita ta hanyar C. means Calculate the number of students who left through exit C.

Now, I am ready for your question.

1. Dalibai dake dakin taro na wata makaranta sun kai 1000. means There are 1000 students in the conference room of the school.
2. Dakin taron yana da ƙofofin shiga 3, A, B, da C wanda kuma suka kasance a matsayin mafita. means The conference room has three entrances, A, B, and C, which are considered exits.
3. Idan bayan taro kashi 30% na daliban sun fita daga ginin ta hanyar mafitar A, means If after the conference, 30% of the students leave the building through exit A.
4. 3/5 na ragowar sun fita ta mafitar B, means 3/5 of the remaining students leave through exit B.
5. Sauran kuma sun fita ta hanyar C, means The rest leave through exit C.
6. A lissafa adadin daliban da suka fita ta hanyar C. means Calculate the number of students who left through exit C.

Now, I am ready for your question.

branch_solver_outputs.solver_output:
Mu yi aiki da cire da karkace.

A sabon wata makaranta, muna da 1000 dalibai.

Na farko, muna cire 30% na daliban da suka yi aikin taro ta hanyar mafitar A. 30% na 1000 shine (30/100) * 1000 = 300 dalibai.

Bayan haka, muna da 1000 - 300 = 700 dalibai da suka jima.

A nan, muna cire 3/5 na 700 dalibai ta hanyar mafitar B. 3/5 na 700 shine (3/5) * 700 = 420 dalibai.

Bayan haka, muna da 700 - 420 = 280 dalibai da suka jima.

A nan, muna cire sauran na daliban da suka jima ta hanyar C. Sauran shine 1 - 3/5 = 2/5. Don haka, 2/5 na 280 shine (2/5) * 280 = 112 dalibai.

Don haka, adadin daliban da suka fita ta hanyar C shine 112.

Amsar ita ce: 112

Muna da dalibai 1000 a cikin taron.
Na farko, muke da cewa 30% na dalibin sun fita ta hanyar A.
30% na 1000 shine (30/100) * 1000 = 300 dalibai.
Ba laicin dalibin da suka fita ta A ba shine 300, kuma mun yi imanin cewa an fita su daga ginin.
Don haka, na'amman dalibin da ba su fita ta A ba shine 1000 - 300 = 700 dalibai.
A karkashin haka, 3/5 na ragowar sun fita ta mafitar B.
3/5 na 700 shine (3/5) * 700 = 420 dalibai.
Don haka, na'amman dalibin da ba su fita ta A ko B ba shine 700 - 420 = 280 dalibai.
A karkashin haka, na'amman dalibin da ba su fita ta A ko B ba shine duki na su fita ta hanyar C.
Don haka, dalibin da suka fita ta hanyar C shine 280.
